name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル5.5 (ニューカマーランド)

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Recovery
keyEvents.description: Luffy completes his recovery from Magellan's poison by eating massive amounts of food in New Kama Land.
keyEvents.significance: Level 5.5 serves as a safe haven for Luffy's recovery before the breakout attempt.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Revelation
keyEvents.description: Luffy reveals to Ivankov that Dragon is his father while in New Kama Land.
keyEvents.significance: This location serves as the setting for one of the most important revelations in the Impel Down arc.

keyEvents.title: Departure from Level 5.5
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Ivankov, and Inazuma leave the safety of New Kama Land to begin their descent to Level 6.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the safe haven and the beginning of the dangerous breakout attempt.

description: A hidden level between Level 5 and Level 6 of Impel Down, carved out by a prisoner with tunneling Devil Fruit powers. Ruled by Emporio Ivankov and known as the Okama Paradise where prisoners party in secret.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル5 (極寒地獄)

keyEvents.title: Entry into Level 5
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Ivankov, and Inazuma enter Level 5 from Level 5.5 and immediately face attacks from the Wolf Unit.
keyEvents.significance: The beginning of their dangerous journey through the prison levels to reach Ace.

description: The fifth level of Impel Down, known as Freezing Hell. An extremely cold environment where prisoners freeze and wolves hunt the inmates.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル6 (無限地獄)

keyEvents.title: Ace's Departure from Level 6
keyEvents.description: Portgas D. Ace is escorted from Level 6 by Magellan to begin his transfer to Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Ace leaving Level 6 creates urgent time pressure for Luffy's rescue attempt.

description: The sixth and deepest level of Impel Down, known as Eternal Hell. Reserved for the most dangerous criminals whose existence is often erased from history.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Execution Scheduled
keyEvents.description: Ace's execution is scheduled to take place at Marineford at 3:00 PM, with only six hours remaining.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Marineford as the site of Ace's impending execution and sets up the Marineford War arc.

description: The headquarters of the Marines, where major events and executions take place. Ace is being transported here for his public execution.

reveals.information: Ace's execution is scheduled at Marineford with heavy Marine security including five Vice Admirals
